p.k: Derrick Rose scored 28 points and blocked Rajon Rondo's potential game-winner, John Salmons scored 35, and the Bulls beat the defending champions 128-127 in triple overtime to tie the first-round series 3-3. Ray Allen scored a career playoff-high 51 points for the Celtics, but it's back to Boston for Game 7 after another instant classic in a series that had already seen its share of drama. Three of the first five games went to overtime, including a Game 4 that went two extra periods. Another came down to the wire in regulation, but this easily trumped them all.
